name: immunotherapy
description: The collection of data elements describing the details of an immunotherapy treatment completed by a donor.

fields.name: program_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the ARGO program.

fields.name: submitter_donor_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.

fields.name: submitter_treatment_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the treatment, assigned by the data provider.

fields.name: immunotherapy_type
fields.description: Indicate the type of immunotherapy administered to donor.

codeList: Monoclonal antibodies other than immune checkpoint inhibitors

fields.name: drug_rxnormcui
fields.description: The unique RxNormID assigned to the treatment regimen drug.

meta.notes:
This field uses standardized vocabulary from the RxNorm database (https://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/rxnorm), provided by the NIH.

You can search for RX Norm values through the web interface (https://mor.nlm.nih.gov/RxNav/) or API (https://mor.nlm.nih.gov/download/rxnav/RxNormAPIs.html).

For example, to find the rxnormcui based on drug name, you can use: https://rxnav.nlm.nih.gov/REST/rxcui.json?name=leucovorin or https://mor.nlm.nih.gov/RxNav/search?searchBy=String&searchTerm=leucovorin

fields.name: drug_name
fields.description: Name of agent or drug administered to donor as part of the treatment regimen.

meta.notes:
This field uses standardized vocabulary from the RxNorm database (https://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/rxnorm), provided by the NIH.

You can search for RX Norm values through the web interface (https://mor.nlm.nih.gov/RxNav/) or API (https://mor.nlm.nih.gov/download/rxnav/RxNormAPIs.html).

For example, to find the rxnormcui based on drug name, you can use: https://rxnav.nlm.nih.gov/REST/rxcui.json?name=leucovorin or https://mor.nlm.nih.gov/RxNav/search?searchBy=String&searchTerm=leucovorin
